sentences.english: The group urges schools to stop selling full-calorie soft drinks.
sentences.chinese: 协会还敦促学校停止出售富含热量的软饮料。

sentences.english: Soft-drinks manufacturers typically consume several times the volume that makes it into their products.
sentences.chinese: 软饮料生产商通常在产品生产过程中会消耗掉部分水。

sentences.english: Biggest of all are carbonated soft drinks, 70% of which are caffeinated.
sentences.chinese: 分量最大的还是碳酸软饮料，70%都含有咖啡因。

sentences.english: The study also forecast an explosion in the diet soft-drink market.
sentences.chinese: 该研究还预测低糖软饮料市场将迅猛增长。

sentences.english: In Africa, most soft drinks are sold in returnable glass bottles.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲，大部分软饮料装在可退的玻璃瓶里卖。

sentences.english: More students like having ice-cream, ice lollies and soft drinks after school.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学生课后爱吃冰淇淋，冰棍和软饮料。

sentences.english: Here is a contract of Coca - Cola soft drink on consignment .
sentences.chinese: 下面是一份可口可乐软饮料寄售合同。

sentences.english: Try store-brand soft drinks, if you must have soft drinks.
sentences.chinese: 尝试超市自有品牌的软饮料，如果你非喝不可。

sentences.english: This constant beverage use increases the risk of tooth decay.
sentences.chinese: 这些源源不断地软饮料增加了牙齿腐烂的风险。

sentences.english: I: You know… coca cola cans, soft drink cans.
sentences.chinese: 你知道可口可乐罐，软饮料罐。

sentences.english: The soft-drinks and healthy drinks are also provided without additional charge.
sentences.chinese: 软饮料和健康饮料，也提供了无额外收费。

sentences.english: Don’t order milkshake or sugary soft drinks.
sentences.chinese: 不要点奶昔或含糖的软饮料。

sentences.english: There are no free soft drinks or volleyball courts.
sentences.chinese: 这里没有免费软饮料，也没有排球场。

sentences.english: The bottler has been struggling to revive soft-drink sales in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 该公司一直竭力振兴在美国的软饮料销售。

sentences.english: That day, I quit drinking soft drink , and replaced it with water.
sentences.chinese: 那天，我戒酒软饮料，而代之以水。

sentences.english: We put the soft drinks in a bucket of ice to keep them cold.
sentences.chinese: 我们把那些软饮料放在一桶冰里冷藏。

pinyin: gao1 guo3 tang2 yu4 mi3 tang2 jiang1
